name: data-card-17
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Lamp Jump.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Lamp Jump.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you won the Pokéathlon’s Lamp Jump.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you won the Pokéathlon’s Lamp Jump.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you won the Pokéathlon’s Lamp Jump.
